title: Intellias and VanOnGo Make Every Trip Count in Last-Mile Delivery - Intellias
snippet: Intellias, a global software engineering and digital consulting company, is announcing the start of a strategic partnership with VanOnGo.
extractedText: London, UK – February 17, 2025 – Intellias, a global software engineering and digital consulting company, is announcing the start of a strategic partnership with VanOnGo, a consumer-centric urban delivery and in-field services orchestration platform. The companies aim to redefine the urban delivery landscape by leveraging their combined expertise in advanced analytics, artificial intelligence, and AR-driven navigation to enhance efficiency, transparency, and customer satisfaction in last-mile logistics. This partnership emerged from a shared vision to address critical challenges in urban logistics, particularly the growing demand for faster, more reliable, and sustainable delivery solutions. By uniting Intellias’s deep domain expertise in retail and logistics software with VanOnGo’s innovative technology, the collaboration will focus on delivering tangible results such as streamlined delivery operations, enhanced real-time tracking for fleet operators, and an improved customer experience marked by faster and more reliable deliveries. Within this collaboration, Intellias and VanOnGo will work together to: Develop market-ready solutions to optimize last-mile delivery operations Enhance the transparency and usability of VanOnGo’s platform for merchants and fleet operators Introduce innovative features such as AR-driven navigation to improve driver experiences Scale VanOnGo’s platform to accommodate a growing customer base while ensuring seamless integrations with retailers’ systems With a strong foundation in retail software development, Intellias will enable VanOnGo to refine its platform’s capabilities, driving improved operational efficiency and scalability. In return, VanOnGo’s robust delivery orchestration platform will empower Intellias to expand its footprint in the retail and logistics industries by showcasing transformative digital solutions for last-mile delivery challenges. Our collaboration with VanOnGo marks a significant step in our journey to transform the retail and logistics industry. By combining our expertise in digital solutions with VanOnGo’s cutting-edge delivery platform, we’re setting new standards for operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. We are confident this partnership will have a long-lasting impact, not only for our companies but for the entire retail market. Alexander Goncharuk, VP of Retail Business at Intellias At VanOnGo, we believe in delivering more than just products—we deliver experiences. Intellias’ exceptional software engineering and domain expertise will help us refine our platform and ensure we continue to exceed our partners’ and customers’ expectations. Together, we’re poised to make urban delivery faster, more efficient, and more customer-friendly than ever before. Denys Lanovskyi, Business Development Director at VanOnGo With more than 20 years of experience serving the retail industry, Intellias offers fast, efficient, and cost-effective retail software development. Retailers that partner with Intellias see an 83% cost reduction to launch a new retail brand digital channel. Intellias also creates AI-powered solutions to help retailers deliver more personalized buying experience for their customers. With scalable systems that grow with the retailer, Intellias has saved retailers millions in stock management costs and has helped retailers worldwide embrace modernization.
author: Alexander Goncharuk,
